      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      person if found, otherwise nothing

      Returns:

    • create

      @AuditLogAnnotation(successMessage="Created Person {person.id}") public boolean create(Person person)
      Creates a new person in the repository
      Parameters:
      person - person to be created
      Returns:
      true if person has been created, false otherwise

    • save

      public Person save(Person person)
      Saves a person to the repository
      Parameters:
      person - person to save
      Returns:
      the person that has been saved if successful, null otherwise

    • update

      @AuditLogAnnotation(successMessage="Updated Person {person.id}") public boolean update(Person person, String username, String email, String password, Set<Permission> permissions)
      Updates a Person with the values given as Parameters. The User is given directly The other Parameters are used to change the user. Parameters that are set to null are left unchanged.
      Parameters:
      person - The person to update
      username - The new Username.
      permissions - The set of new permissions.
      password - The new Password.
      Returns:
      true if the user could be found and could be updated, false otherwise.

    • update

      public boolean update(UUID personId, String username, String email, Set<Permission> permissions, String password)
      updates a person with the values given as parameters person is identified by id
      Parameters:
      personId - id of the person to update
      username - new username
      permissions - set of new permissions
      password - new password
      Returns:
      true if user was successfully update, false otherwise

    • delete

      @AuditLogAnnotation(successMessage="Deleted Person {personId}") public boolean delete(UUID personId)
      Deletes a Person from the Database (hard delete).
      Parameters:
      personId - The ID of the Person to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the person was deleted, false otherwise.
